targets.rawQueryText: SELECT timestamp_value AS time, metric_value, json_extract(metric_labels, '$.id') AS "kpi" FROM query_results qr JOIN clusters c ON qr.cluster_id = c.id WHERE ('${cluster}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_name = '${cluster}') AND kpi_id = 'cpu-system' AND timestamp_value >= $__from / 1000 AND timestamp_value < $__to / 1000 AND ('${cluster_type}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_type = '${cluster_type}')
SELECT kpi_id AS metric, errors AS value FROM query_errors ORDER BY errors DESC;

SELECT kpi_id AS metric, AVG(metric_value) AS value FROM query_results qr JOIN clusters c ON qr.cluster_id = c.id WHERE ('${cluster}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_name = '${cluster}') AND ('${cluster_type}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_type = '${cluster_type}') GROUP BY metric;

SELECT timestamp_value AS time, execution_time AS value, kpi_id FROM query_results qr JOIN clusters c ON qr.cluster_id = c.id WHERE ('${cluster}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_name = '${cluster}') AND ('${cluster_type}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_type = '${cluster_type}') ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT kpi_id, COUNT(*) AS sample_count, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value, MIN(metric_value) AS min_value, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM query_results qr JOIN clusters c ON qr.cluster_id = c.id WHERE ('${cluster}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_name = '${cluster}') AND ('${cluster_type}' = '$__all' OR c.cluster_type = '${cluster_type}') GROUP BY kpi_id;

list.name: cluster_type
list.label: Cluster Type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT cluster_type FROM clusters WHERE cluster_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cluster_type;

list.name: cluster
list.label: Cluster
list.query: SELECT cluster_name FROM clusters WHERE ('${cluster_type}' = '$__all' OR cluster_type = '${cluster_type}' OR cluster_type IS NULL) ORDER BY cluster_name;
